title: Pricing
subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs

items.question: What counts as an API request?
items.answer: Each call to your {{appName}} endpoint counts as one request, regardless of the underlying LLM provider used.

items.question: Do I need my own LLM API keys?
items.answer: Yes, you provide your own API keys for OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, or custom LM servers. We securely store them encrypted.

items.question: Can I change plans later?
items.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect on your next billing cycle.
